kolambaa – katunayaka adhiwegi margaya, mathara – katharagama dumriya margaya, norachchole thapa balagaraya, kolambaa prasanga kala madhyasthanaya, hambanthota waraya, maththala jathyanthara guwan thotupola aadi dawantha wyapruthi gananawak sidukaranne china rajayayi.apata wishala washayen ma aadhara karanne japanayayi.japana wishesha niyojitha yashushi akashi mahatha ge pasugiya shri lanka sancharayedi samanyayen japanaya apata laba dena aadhara harunu wita a. do. miliyana 400k labuna.me nidasun kihipaya mangin wunath pahadili wenne dan itha ma subadayaka thaththwayak athi bawayi.
